summary: Add regression test coverage for issue #1918 (DoS prevention via file size limit). The security fix was already implemented in storage.py (lines 14-15, 63-71) - this candidate adds the corresponding test suite.
risks: No code changes required - fix was already present
Tests verify existing behavior but don't modify implementation
acceptance_criteria_met: Test verifies ValueError is raised for oversized files (>10MB)
Test verifies normal-sized files load correctly
Test verifies behavior at boundary conditions
